text: For the seller shall not return to that which is sold, although they were yet alive: for the vision is touching the whole multitude thereof, which shall not return; neither shall any strengthen himself in the iniquity of his life.7.13 although they…: Heb. though their life were yet among the living7.13 in the…: or, whose life is in his iniquity7.13 the iniquity: Heb. his iniquity
